sentence.Network_en: He showed unfeigned satisfaction at his friend's success.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对朋友的成功表现出真正的满足。

sentence.Network_en: Her interest in people was unfeigned.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对人的关心是真诚的.

sentence.Network_en: Their hosts received them with unfeigned pleasure.
sentence.Network_cn: 主人带着由衷的喜悦接待了他们.
